MeTL is not a word processor, a paint program or a slide presenter.
MeTL is an experimental workbench.
We're exploring the impact of different teaching styles and methodologies.

And we just can't teach in a way these students will understand, doing justice to the opportunities we have in this century, without critically reexamining all of our practices.
